SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers

Class CommonCardsPointsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.PointsManager
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CardsPointsManager
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonCardsPointsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
StandardListenable
public class CommonCardsPointsManager extends CardsPointsManager implements StandardListenable
A PointsManager that handles all the common cards, which are goals that anyone can fulfill only once, this PointsManager does not take into account neither the points nor the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck)
    Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 2 cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
    CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck, Integer drawNumber)
    Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
    CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck, Integer drawNumber, Function<Integer,Stack<Integer>> generateCardTokens)
    Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, using the 'generateCardTokens' function, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view.
    CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Map<Player,Integer> playersToPoints, UpdateRule updateRule, Deck deck, Map<Pattern,Stack<Integer>> cardsToTokens, Map<Player,List<Integer>> playersToTokens, Map<Player,Set<Pattern>> playersToUnfulfilledCards)
    Used for deserialization

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonCardsPointsManager

      public CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck)
      Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 2 cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view. The UpdateRule of the CommonCardsPointsManager is set to END_TURN (because the order in which cards are fulfilled throughout the game is relevant.
      Parameters:
      players - the players
      deck - the deck of patterns from which to draw 2 cards

    • CommonCardsPointsManager

      public CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck, Integer drawNumber)
      Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view. The UpdateRule of the CommonCardsPointsManager is set to END_TURN (because the order in which cards are fulfilled throughout the game is relevant.
      Parameters:
      players - the players
      deck - the deck of patterns from which to draw drawNumber cards
      drawNumber - the number of cards to draw

    • CommonCardsPointsManager

      public CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Deck deck, Integer drawNumber, Function<Integer,Stack<Integer>> generateCardTokens)
      Generates a CommonCardsPointsManager which draws 'drawNumber' cards from the given deck and assigns tokens to the cards based on the number of players, using the 'generateCardTokens' function, it also creates an appropriate listener because some internal changes (tokens on cards) need to be communicated to the view. The UpdateRule of the CommonCardsPointsManager is set to END_TURN (because the order in which cards are fulfilled throughout the game is relevant.
      Parameters:
      players - the players
      deck - the deck of patterns from which to draw drawNumber cards
      drawNumber - the number of cards to draw
      generateCardTokens - a function that given the number of players returns a stack of tokens

    • CommonCardsPointsManager

      public CommonCardsPointsManager(List<Player> players, Map<Player,Integer> playersToPoints, UpdateRule updateRule, Deck deck, Map<Pattern,Stack<Integer>> cardsToTokens, Map<Player,List<Integer>> playersToTokens, Map<Player,Set<Pattern>> playersToUnfulfilledCards)
      Used for deserialization
      Parameters:
      players - the players
      playersToPoints - players to points
      updateRule - the update rule
      deck - the deck
      cardsToTokens - cards to tokens
      playersToTokens - players to tokens
      playersToUnfulfilledCards - players to unfulfilled cards

    • update

      private void update(Player player)
      updates playersToUnfulfilledCards, playersToTokens, cardsToTokens, based on the player's unfulfilled cards fulfilled by the player
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check for cards fulfillment

    • partitionCardsByFulfillment

      private Map<Boolean,Set<Pattern>> partitionCardsByFulfillment(Player player, Set<Pattern> cards)
      Partitions the old unfulfilled cards of the player in two partitions: one with the cards fulfilled by the player (true) one with the cards unfulfilled by the player (false)
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check for cards fulfillment
      cards - the unfulfilled cards of the checked player
      Returns:
      a map (of type Map<Boolean, Set<Pattern>>) where map.get(true) is a Set of cards that have just been fulfilled map.get(false) is a Set of cards that have not yet been fulfilled

    • hasPlayerFulfilledCard

      private Predicate<Pattern> hasPlayerFulfilledCard(Player player)
      Given the player, returns a predicate that applies the function of the card to the bookshelf of the player
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check for card fulfillment
      Returns:
      a predicate that given a card to test returns true if the player has fulfilled it and false if the player has not

    • moveTokenFromCardToPlayer

      private Consumer<Pattern> moveTokenFromCardToPlayer(Player player)
      Given the player, returns a consumer that moves the token
      Parameters:
      player - the player that takes the token
      Returns:
      a consumer that given a card: removes the token from that card (editing cardsToTokens) and gives it to the player (editing playersToTokens)
